text: new paragraphs perfluorochemicals amend rsa by inserting after paragraph ix the following new paragraphs the maximum contaminant levels in surface waters for the following shall be a perfluorooctanoic acid pfoa parts per trillion b perfluoroctanesulfonic acid pfos parts per trillion c perfluorohexanesulfonic acid pfhxs parts per trillion d perfluorononanoic acid pfna parts per trillion e perfluorobutyrate pfba parts per trillion f perfluorobutanesulfonic acid pfbs parts per trillion g the total contaminant levels of subparagraphs a through f parts per trillion by november and at least annually thereafter the commissioner of the department of environmental services shall report to the speaker of the house of representatives and the president of the senate the chairperson of the house committee on science technology and energy the chairperson of the senate committee on energy and natural resources the chairperson of the joint legislative committee on administrative rules and the governor with a recommendation regarding the adjustment of the maximum contaminant levels set in paragraph the commissioner of the department of environmental services may adopt maximum contaminant levels different than those set forth in paragraph x if accounting for an adequate margin of safety to protect human health at all life stages including but not limited to prenatal development the commissioner determines the maximum contaminant levels in paragraph x need adjustment for the protection of human health
